name: 李俊賢
objective: Discrete-time systems and the z-transform, sampling and reconstruction, open-loop discrete-time systems, closed-loop systems, system time-response characteristics, stability analysis techniques, and digital controller design
schedule:
Week 1-2: Introduction (Ch. 1)
Week 3-4: Discrete-time systems and the z-transform (Ch. 2)
Week 5-6: Sampling and reconstruction (Ch. 3)
Week 7-8: Open-loop discrete-time systems (Ch. 4)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10-11: Closed-loop systems (Ch. 5)
Week 12-13: System time-response characteristics (Ch. 6)
Week 14-15: Stability analysis techniques (Ch. 7)
Week 16-17: Digital controller design (Ch. 8)
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy: Grading: 實習(4-5次)：40%、小考(2次)：10%、期中考：20%、期末考：20%、平時(含出席)：10%
materials:
Slides: 自編講義.
Textbook: C. L. Phillips, H. T. Nagle, and A. Chakrabortty, Digital Control Systems: Analysis & Design, 4/e, Pearson Education, 2015 (滄海圖書代理).
